abstract: Buoyed by an aggressive interest rate cut, investors sent stocks soaring to their biggest gain in five years on Tuesday. Shares of financial firms surged, for a day at least, and the Dow Jones industrial average gained 420 points.
lead_paragraph: Buoyed by an aggressive interest rate cut, investors sent stocks soaring to their biggest gain in five years on Tuesday. Shares of financial firms surged, for a day at least, and the Dow Jones industrial average gained 420 points.

headline.main: Wall St. Embraces the Fed’s Relief Efforts
